thread.title: New York Mansion of Madam CJ Walker is in jeopardy | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: New York Mansion of Madam CJ Walker is in jeopardy | Daily Mail Online

author: Abigail Miller For Dailymail.Com
title: New York Mansion of Madam CJ Walker is in jeopardy | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Multi-million dollar New York Mansion built by black hair-care entrepreneur and America's first female self-made millionaire goes on sale 100 years ago Madam CJ Walker built a mansion called 'Villa Lewaro' for $250,000 in Irvington, New York Current residents are getting ready to move, and preservationists worry about the home's future Significantly altering the home would be a blow to Walker's achievements as she was the first self-made female millionaire, and also the daughter of slaves Before her death at 51, she was an active member of the NAACP and a face of the Harlem renaissance Published: 20:41 GMT, 19 February 2017 | Updated: 01:23 GMT, 20 February 2017 86 shares
